An intake document named “intake” was transmitted via VineSign and has been completed. The signed document URL is https://app.vinesign.com/Jobs/Pdf?pdfKey=7a5ce01e-d662-4e13-be02-f18d9f7e1668.pdf. __Person Making Contact:__ Justin
__Date & Time__: October 13 2025
episodes.natural_language:
Initial client contact on October 13, 2025, with Justin regarding a motor vehicle accident involving Dakota McCord (DOB 10/20/1989, SSN 400-39-1108). The client resides at 4106 St. Francis Lane, Louisville, KY 40218, and can be reached at 502-442-8128. Case: Dakota-McCord-MVA-10-12-2025. Date of accident: October 12, 2025. The crash occurred in Indiana on Eastern Boulevard, on the on-ramp to I-65, and the client was T-boned at an intersection. Clarksville Police Department responded; Report number 202560643; Officer Waters. PIP insurance is Progressive; Claim number 25-743079174. The client was transported to University of Louisville Hospital downtown by Heartland EMS.

Injuries reported include a possible concussion, lower back pain, and hip pain. The details above were conveyed by Justin in the initial contact.
episodes.author: Filevine Integration

episodes.natural_language:
Case Dakota-McCord-MVA-10-12-2025 involves client Dakota McCord in a motor vehicle accident.

The Bodily Injury (BI) insurer, identified by the handle @aaronw, is denying liability and has placed 100% liability on our client. A denial letter is in route.
episodes.author: Justin Chumbley

about.relevance: client involved in motor vehicle accident
